disclaimer.title: Welcome to Nilos!
disclaimer.subtitle:
You have to be a legal representative of the company (Director, CEO, President, ...) to access Nilos services.

If you are not legally entitled to open an account on behalf of your company, please directly send an email to compliance@nilos.io.

individuals_list.title: Verify your individuals list
individuals_list.subtitle:
In order to accept your application, we need to collect complete information regarding all of your entity's beneficial owners.
Who is the beneficial owner of a company? The ultimate beneficial owner (UBO) is the natural person who ultimately owns or manages a company. This person does not have to be known directly as the owner.

A beneficial owner is a person who owns more than 25% of the company's shares, controls more than 25% of the voting rights or who can similarly exercise significant control over the company.

Before moving to the next step, please make sure that all natural persons considered as UBOs according to this definition have been entered. For data security reasons, you will not be able to go back to this step once submitted.

agreement.title: Final agreement
agreement.subtitle:
I/we fully understand and confirm for and on behalf of the Entity I/we represent that:

  • I/we have full power and authority to open the Nilos Account and to enter into the associated terms and conditions and representations for and on behalf of the applicant company.
  • The information provided in this application is true, accurate, and complete.
  • I/we will promptly notify Nilos of any changes to the information provided, but no later than 7 business days following the occurrence of such changes.

registration_certificate.description: Please provide the legal document which evidences the formation or registration of your legal entity. This document must have been issued within the last 3 months.

articles_of_association.title: Articles / Memorandum of incorporation
articles_of_association.description: Please upload the document which governs and regulates the activities of the company and outlines rules and procedures to govern the company. Please upload the latest and most up to date version.

ubo_registry_extract.title: Shareholders register
ubo_registry_extract.callout:
Please upload a register showing ownership of your company (click here to download an empty Shareholders register template). The document should be dated within the last 12 months.
If the document is not issued by a government or a registry, please ensure the document is signed by an appropriate authority (i.e. Director, Company Secretary, Legal, or equivalent) and contains the statement "I attest and confirm that this document is true, valid and accurate as of DDMMY".


The signer should sign off with their full name, capacity/designation, and date of sign off.
